mapper.select: SELECT no, type, title, user_no userNo, p.species_no speciesNo, price, check_in checkIn, check_out checkOut, pet_cnt petCnt, introduce, amenity, main_address mainAddress, sub_address subAddress, post_num postNum, phone_num phoneNum, transport, lat, lng, regdate, s.species_name speciesName FROM pooms p, species s WHERE no = #{no} WHERE p.species_no = s.no
mapper.insert:
SELECT pooms_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO pooms(no, type, title, user_no, species_no, price, check_in, check_out, pet_cnt, introduce, amenity, main_address, sub_address, post_num, phone_num, transport, lat, lng, regdate) VALUES (#{no},#{type},#{title},#{userNo},#{speciesNo},#{price}, #{checkIn},#{checkOut},#{petCnt},#{introduce},#{amenity}, #{mainAddress},#{subAddress}, #{postNum},#{phoneNum},#{transport},#{lat},#{lng},systimestamp)
mapper.update: UPDATE pooms SET type=#{type},title=#{title}, species_no=#{speciesNo}, price=#{price}, check_in=#{checkIn}, check_out=#{checkOut}, pet_cnt=#{petCnt}, introduce=#{introduce}, amenity=#{amenity}, main_address=#{mainAddress}, sub_address=#{subAddress}, post_num=#{postNum}, transport=#{transport}, lat=#{lat}, lng=#{lng} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT img, type, title, petName, petCnt, regdate FROM(SELECT ph.img img, po.type type, po.title title, s.name petName, po.pet_cnt petCnt, po.regdate regdate FROM pooms po, photos ph, species s WHERE po.no = ph.content_no AND po.species_no = s.no AND ph.type = 'M' ORDER BY regdate DESC) WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 8

SELECT no, img, type, title, score FROM(SELECT po.no no, ph.img img, po.type type, po.title title, NVL(score.score,0) score FROM pooms po, photos ph, (SELECT TRUNC(AVG(r.score),1) score, b.poom_no poomNo FROM reviews r, bookings b WHERE r.booking_no = b.no GROUP BY b.poom_no) score WHERE po.no = ph.content_no AND ph.type = 'M' AND score.poomNo(+) = po.no ORDER BY score DESC) WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 8
